channel.title: Massive problem (here) if u can solve u r the best coder ever
channel.description:
THIS IS (PI)
I HAVE A CACHE I WANNA USE FOR THIS CLIENT BUT THE PROBLEM IS HOW DO I GET THE CLIENT TO DOWNLOAD THE CACHE WHEN IT PRESSES RUN
I TRIED EVERYTHING I EXTRACTED THE CACHE TO A .ZIP AND THEN LOADED IT DROP BOX GOT THE LINK AND PASTED IN THE CLIENT FILES AND THEN IT'S ALL GOOD I RUN THE CACHE DOWNLOADS FINE AND THEN WHEN THE CACHE FINISHES DOWNLOADING IT SAYS ERROR LOADING PLEASE REPORT AND THEN WHAT?
IF SOMEONE CAN HELP ME I WILL PAY $5 ADD MY MSN lebo_aymenh@hotmail.com IF U HELP ME I SWEAR I WILL PAY YOU!!
OR YOU CAN EVEN DO IT AND IF U DO IT FOR ME I WILL PAY U $10

item.title: Massive problem (here) if u can solve u r the best coder ever
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Make sure you’re not zipping the cache folder.

Should be like this.

[EliteDemonsCache.zip]
[sprites]
[raw]
[data]
[models.idx]
[etc…]

I made that mistake of zipping my cache folder it’s self.

You need to go into your cache folder, highlight everything than click “add to archive”.
Than toggle it to “Zip” and it will create a new .zip archive with all the cache contents inside of it, so therefor when it unzips it, it will not hold a secondary folder = wrong path.

Read full topic
